title: Alexandra Burke celebrates boyfriend Angus MacDonald's birthday
text:
She makes no secret of their romance on social media.

And Wednesday was no different for Alexandra Burke as she wished her boyfriend Angus MacDonald happy birthday with a saucy post showing them dancing.

The Bad Boys hitmaker, 31, posted the gushing message just weeks after the Hull City defender announced he was diagnosed with the early stages of the bowel cancer but was determined to fight it last month.

Happy days! Wednesday was no different for Alexandra Burke as she wished her boyfriend Angus MacDonald happy birthday with a saucy post showing them dancing

Alexandra looked sensational in a tight khaki top with jeans as she cosied up to her beau who was donning a neon pink hoodie.

She added a message under the picture reading: 'It's your birthday!!! Happy birthday my lovely. Today is your day! Such a blessing... Another year older and wiser. You deserve nothing but the best. Never change. You beautiful soul. Xx'.

Earlier this month, Alexandra penned a gushing tribute to Angus, just weeks after he was diagnosed with bowel cancer.

The singer told the footballer: 'You’re so special to me and I adore you' as she shared a slew of loved-up snaps on Instagram.

Happy days: The Bad Boys hitmaker, 31, posted the gushing message just weeks after t he Hull City defender announced he was diagnosed with the early stages of the bowel cancel but was determined to fight it last month

Loved-up: Earlier this month, Alexandra penned a gushing tribute to Angus, just weeks after he was diagnosed with bowel cancer

Alexandra, who split from her fiancé Josh Ginnelly after three years together earlier this year, publically declared her love to Angus.

Sharing snaps from her birthday, Japan and trip to Disneyland, Alexandra wrote: 'Just a little appreciation post for this amazing man....Thank you for coming into my life and making me constantly smile.

'All we do is laugh and have the most loving time together.

'You’re so special to me and I adore you. I admire your strength and I admire your passion for life. Never change baby. Counting down the days until I see you...'

Full of adoration: The Hull City defender has been diagnosed with the early stages of the bowel cancer, with the club confirming news in a statement on behalf of the defender

The Hull City defender has been diagnosed with the early stages of the bowel cancer, with the club confirming news in a statement on behalf of the defender.

X-Factor winner Burke took to her Instagram stories on September 4 to voice support for her new beau.

She shared a posted a picture of them walking together along the beach hand in hand while on holiday in Dubai, captioned with 'Always by his side. Forever. @angusmac15.'

Smitten: Sharing snaps from her birthday, Japan and trip to Disneyland (pictured), Alexandra wrote: 'Just a little appreciation post for this amazing man....Thank you for coming into my life'

MacDonald also posted on his Instagram account on the same day, saying the news has come as a 'shock' but that he will be ready to fight this new challenge 'head on.'

The news came just two days after he put on an extravagant celebration for Burke's 31st birthday, that included a trip to celebrity hotspot Sheesh in Essex.

The defender, who has spent the last 12 months on the sidelines, confirmed he will be taking a few days of social media to process the difficult news.

True love: One of the photos the X Factor singer shared the lovebirds cuddled on a chair

He said: 'This is not an easy post to write but life isn't always an easy road to navigate. The news broke today from my club that I have been diagnosed with Bowel Cancer.

'After a year on the sidelines and recently getting back into full training, returning to the pitch felt closer than ever, so this news has come as a complete shock and is hard to take and fully process.

'However, I'm blessed to have fantastic family and friends and some very good people around me to help me get through this, as well as amazing team mates and staff at the club who have been with me all the way through the past year.

Trip of a life time: Alexandra and Angus have just enjoyed a holiday touring Japan

'I'm getting my head around this new challenge that lies ahead. I will be ready to fight this head on, and I'm going to do whatever I can to get back to full health and back on that pitch.'

Taking to Instagram, Alexandra, who was thought to have split from her fiancé Josh Ginnelly in June, when she wiped him from her Instagram account, shared a besotted snap in front of the restaurant and thanked Angus for his generosity.

Alexandra and Angus went public with their romance back in July, after they were seen together at Wimbledon.
